content:
I'm working on an IG which depends on UK Core. @Ward Weistra

How do you include a full rendering of a resource?
e.g. on here https://simplifier.net/guide/ElectronicPrescriptionServiceIG/CapabilityStatement
I'm using render to display the CapabilityStatement but I really want to just go direct to a full display of the the resource.

Same for profiles. I want to embed this view on the page

Screenshot-2020-05-31-at-07.43.54.png
This may be a basic question but couldn't find the answer
Presume I need to log an issue to request MessageDefinition is rendered and in CapabilityStatement the messaging component is rendererd.
Hi @Kevin Mayfield, {{render:...}} shows what's on the Overview tab, table what's on the Table tab, xml and json what's on those tabs.
And indeed, if you're missing a rendering I'd love to hear that with a suggestion of how you'd want it to look like!

Thanks.

I was after something like this

https://interopen.github.io/careconnect-base-stu3/StructureDefinition-CareConnect-Patient-1.html

The top part is a xml or markdown with the autogenerated profile section coming after that.
